data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Couto Pereira have now been confirmed.
The match is underway. Coritiba have kicked-off.
In the minute 1, Throw-in Recife PE.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in high up the field for Recife PE in Curitiba.
Raphael Claus awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Recife PE's Jonathan Gomez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 6, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Raphael Claus awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Coritiba's Luiz Henrique gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Recife PE.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 10, In Curitiba Coritiba attack through Sassa. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
Raphael Claus signals a Coritiba throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 13, Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Recife PE.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Raphael Claus blows against Recife PE's Elton for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 20, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
In the minute 23, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Recife PE's Betinho breaks free at Estadio Couto Pereira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 24, Patrick Vieira is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Coritiba's Patrick Vieira looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 26, Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Sassa for Coritiba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Recife PE at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 30, Ronaldo for Recife PE is back on the field again.
The match at Estadio Couto Pereira has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ronaldo, who is down injured.
Raphael Claus awards the home team a throw-in.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Can Recife PE capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Raphael Claus awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Recife PE.
Raphael Claus signals a throw-in for Coritiba, close to Recife PE's area.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
In the minute 41, Sabino (Coritiba) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Marquinhos is back on his feet again.
In the minute 45, Jonathan Gomez returns to the field for Recife PE after picking up a slight injury.
Raphael Claus signals a Coritiba throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Coritiba needs to be cautious. Recife PE have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 45, Raphael Claus blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Attention is being given to Recife PEâ€™s Jonathan Gomez and play has been suspended briefly.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Curitiba to check on Marquinhos, who is grimacing with pain.
Recife PE kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Matheus Bueno is replacing Luiz Henrique for the home team.
In the minute 47, Coritiba to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Coritiba.
Raphael Claus signals a Recife PE throw-in in Coritiba's half.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
Coritiba are pushing forward but Matheus Galdezani's finish is wide of the goal.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Recife PE to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Jonathan Gomez of Recife PE gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 54, Raphael Claus awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Coritiba make their second substitution with Jonathan replacing Patrick Vieira.
Sassa (Coritiba) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 55, It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Recife PE.
Sassa is back on the pitch.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Raphael Claus waits before resuming play because Sassa for Coritiba is still down.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in Recife PE.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Recife PE.
In the minute 62, Rodolfo is on a sub for Rhodolfo for Coritiba.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a Coritiba throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Can Coritiba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
Daniel Paulista is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Couto Pereira with Leandro Barcia replacing Marquinhos.
In the minute 63, Lucas Mugni is replacing Jonathan Gomez for Recife PE at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 64, Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Curitiba, Elton of Recife PE is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 70, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Coritiba just outside Recife PE's area.
At Estadio Couto Pereira, Iago Maidana has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 72, The away team replace Elton with Hernane Brocador.
Daniel Paulista (Recife PE) is making a fourth substitution, with Marcao Silva replacing Ronaldo.
Throw-in Recife PE.
In the minute 73, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 75, Recife PE to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
In Curitiba Recife PE attack through Patric. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Coritiba.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Coritiba make their fourth substitution with Giovanni Augusto replacing Matheus Galdezani.
In the minute 78, Luciano is replacing Sander for the away team.
Igor Jesus is on a sub for Neilton for Coritiba.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Betinho for Recife PE has been booked by Raphael Claus and receives a first yellow card.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 88, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hernane Brocador (Recife PE) gets a yellow card.
Igor Jesus (Coritiba) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
An attacking Coritiba player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
Coritiba's Rodolfo has been booked in Curitiba.
Mailson (Recife PE) has received a yellow card from Raphael Claus.
Goal! Sabino gives Coritiba a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
